column3: On the one hand this seems alright, now that we're gradually deprecating BDB. But at the same time, we haven't finished the wallet upgrade tooling, which requires the presence of both.
Given that there are plenty of devs on macOS and all the remaining CI tasks also test bdb, I don't think this will cause any issues.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.
